itemListElement.name: Sour Cream & Onion Hemp Millet Crunch Snack/Granola. Gluten-free Vegan Recipe

@graph.name: Sour Cream & Onion Hemp Millet Crunch Snack/Granola. Gluten-free Vegan Recipe
@graph.description: This sour cream onion granola is a fun snack. crunchy savory hemp millet clusters. Use as snack or top soups and salads. Gluten-free Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1 tsp white vinegar  (or apple cider vinegar)
3 to 4 Tbsp almond butter  (or other nut butter/seed butter)
a very generous dash of black pepper
1 tsp dried dill  (or 1 Tbsp finely chopped fresh dill)
1/2 cup puffed millet  (or other puffed grains)
onion powder (dill and salt for sprinkling)

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix the non dairy milk, vinegar and let sit to curdle.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, mix the non dairy milk, vinegar and let sit to curdle.

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, melt the coconut oil on medium-low heat. Add the almond butter and mix until smooth. Add the maple, flax and curdled non dairy milk and mix well. Add all the spices till parsley and mix in. the mixture should be hot at this point. If not, then let it heat up for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, melt the coconut oil on medium-low heat. Add the almond butter and mix until smooth. Add the maple, flax and curdled non dairy milk and mix well. Add all the spices till parsley and mix in. the mixture should be hot at this point. If not, then let it heat up for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the puffed millet, oats, hemp seeds and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the puffed millet, oats, hemp seeds and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Press the mixture in a parchment lined bread pan (9 by 5 inch or similar). Bake at pre-heated 340 degrees F / 170ºc for 10 to 12 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Press the mixture in a parchment lined bread pan (9 by 5 inch or similar). Bake at pre-heated 340 degrees F / 170ºc for 10 to 12 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Let cool completely, then remove from pan. Sprinkle onion powder, dill, salt to taste and toss. and store in an airtight container.
recipeInstructions.name: Let cool completely, then remove from pan. Sprinkle onion powder, dill, salt to taste and toss. and store in an airtight container.
